attributes.action: Stop The Underclass/Poorest in Society Being Gouged by 254% Loans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In The Past I was Privaledged To Have A High Income, That Was Until I Became Ill And Left Disabled. The Welfare System Gives A Living Standard Way Below Acceptable. The Poor Who Need Money For Normal Everyday Things Like Christmas presents, Birthday Gifts, Christening and Wedding Gifts, Televisions and Cars, Things That Are Taken For Granted In Our Society By The Wealthy Are Being Gouged By Companies Like A, P, S, With Loans With Hundreds Of Percentage Point Interest rates. I Ask Gordon Brown To Show He Cares About The Poor and The Underclass Especially Of The Disabled and Unable to OBTAIN A Job Classes To Be Protected Against These Immoral And Heinous Companies. Please Vote Now For My Appeal. Thank You.
